plot: A Japanese television show adapted from the manga of the same name about two rival high school baseball games. The stars of each team, Hideo and Hiro, happen to be childhood friends.
plot_en: A Japanese television show adapted from the manga of the same name about two rival high school baseball games. The stars of each team, Hideo and Hiro, happen to be childhood friends.
plot_es: A Japanese television show adapted from the manga of the same name about two rival high school baseball games. The stars of each team, Hideo and Hiro, happen to be childhood friends.
title: H2: Kimi to itahibi
